bibl.title: Sappho. A New Translation of the Complete Works.
bibl.note: Introduction (A.L.). - Note on translation (D.J.R.). - Sappho (D.J.R.) [partly a revised version of: Diane J. Rayor, Sappho's Lyre. Archaic Lyric and Women Poets of Ancient Greece. Translations, with Introduction and Notes. Foreword by W.R. Johnson (Berkeley - Los Angeles - Oxford, 1991)]. - Notes. - Appendix [about P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= LDAB 341738)]. - Selected bibliography. Index of First Lines.
bibl.seg: Diane J. Rayor & André Lardinois, Sappho. A New Translation of the Complete Works.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2014, 8°, x-173 pp., 1 fig. ISBN 978-1-107-02359-8. £40.99.

Introduction (A.L.). - Note on translation (D.J.R.). - Sappho (D.J.R.) [partly a revised version of: Diane J. Rayor, Sappho's Lyre. Archaic Lyric and Women Poets of Ancient Greece. Translations, with Introduction and Notes. Foreword by W.R. Johnson (Berkeley - Los Angeles - Oxford, 1991)]. - Notes. - Appendix [about P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= LDAB 341738)]. - Selected bibliography. Index of First Lines.
C.R. par Margaret Williamson, CR N.S., 66 (2016) p. 288.
